headline: Military Tensions Flare Between China And Taiwan
summary: Taiwan's defense minister says that tensions between Taipei and Beijing are at their worst in more than 40 years as China increases military flights within the island’s air defense zone. Taiwanese officials say nearly 150 aircraft belonging to China's air force have entered the zone in the last four days.The U.S. State Department called China‘s latest actions destabilizing and risky, while China has taken offense to the presence of U.S. ships in the Taiwan Strait. President Joe Biden says Chinese President Xi Jinping has agreed to abide by the "Taiwan agreement," which allows Washington to maintain a relationship with and sell arms to Taiwan.
